## Load More Gecko Codes

Load a gecko code file from the save data directory and process it using the
current codehandler. The purpose is to allow loading more lines of code than
the regular codehandler allows.

The file it loads is named "SMN?01.gct", where ? is the region code. If on
Dolphin, add this in the Gecko Codes tab, and then right click on the game
in the game list, select "Open Wii Save Folder", and then create the GCT
file in there with the other codes you want.

This code is for New Super Mario Bros. Wii. Many revisions may be untested.

<details>
<summary>PAL Rev 1</summary>

```hex
C0000000 0000004F
806F008C 7C037840
4DA20020 91EF008C
386F008C 394F0098
396F0098 398F00A8
7C035040 4080001C
85230004 55200001
40A2FFF0 7D297A14
91230000 4BFFFFE4
7C035840 40800018
85230004 7D49782E
7D4A7A14 7D49792E
4BFFFFE8 7C036040
4C800020 85230004
7D234850 552901BA
65294800 91230000
7C0018AC 7C0004AC
7C001FAC 4C00012C
4BFFFFD4 00000000
0000026C 8042A664
00000288 801D96F0
801D9990 801D8B30
801D9180 81CBFFB8
81EBFFBC 820BFFC0

82EBFFDC 830BFFE0
```
